Text.Page:
Pay attention now. I'm only going to say this once.

At the central part of the lair, you'll find {@LinkCreature:39#130#arachnen matriarchs}. They aren't the strongest creatures in here, but they have very hard shells, which we can put to good use.

Collect the shells and deliver them to Paicha at Roughneck Outpost. He'll take it from there.

Arachnen shells, eh?

Yes, I can use those to patch some of our heavy armor suits. Appreciate the help!
